resources.string: Error detection for new threads (See more at info dialog)
Define the jitter for new threads. Long is balance between performance and reliability. (See more at info dialog)
Start the service on phone boot and when starting the app in order to correctly interpret the messages
Enable or disable the listener service responsible for interpreting the messages.
Manage code maps (See more at info dialog)
Defines a set of parameters to tune the integration with other software
Defining a authorization password will enable the feature (See more at info)
Password must be at least 6 characters
You are about to delete this code map. The phone numbers to which it is associated will have no code mapping feature.
Please input your phone number. It will be useful on import, in order to associate this code map with your phone number on the receiver.
A string equal to the entered text already exists
The empty string is not allowed
The code list can not be empty
You may want to share your code map
This will override the current code map
This code map is associated with the following numbers: %s
Long press to open context menu
Press code map in use to deselect
